heroStructures.name: The SaaS Split (50/50)
heroStructures.description: The gold standard for B2B. Left column for rigorous value prop & CTA, Right column for high-fidelity visual proof (app screenshot or interactive graphic).
structure: Left: Badge -> H1 (Left Align) -> Subtext -> Dual CTA

heroStructures.name: The Visual Anchor (Center + Depth)
heroStructures.description: High impact for 'Platform' plays. Centered typography that anchors a massive, tilted 3D dashboard preview underneath. Creates a sense of scale and depth.
structure: Top: Pill -> H1 (Center, Balanced) -> Subtext -> CTA

heroStructures.name: The Bento Hero
heroStructures.description: Modern & Feature-Rich. Headline on top-left, followed instantly by a Bento Grid of key features. Eliminates the 'fold'.

landingPageFlows.name: SaaS Conversion Prime (The Standard)
flow: 2. Hero (The Hook: Value Prop + Social Proof)
6. How it Works (The How: Zig-Zag Steps)

footerStructures.name: The Mega Sitemap (Enterprise)
footerStructures.description: For platforms with profound depth. Organizes content into clear silos.
structure: Middle: 5-6 Columns (Product, Resources, Company, Legal, Developers, Support)
Bottom: Copyright + Status Indicator + Theme Toggle

footerStructures.name: The Minimalist Brand
footerStructures.description: For focused tools or personal portfolios. prioritizing aesthetics.
structure: Single Row of Links (About, Blog, Contact)

guidelines.do: Use scroll-behavior: smooth on html element
Add padding-top to body equal to nav height
Highlight active nav item with color/underline
Use for sites with 3+ levels of depth
Animate 1-2 key elements per view maximum
Use transform and opacity for animations
Use ease-out for entering ease-in for exiting
Test all content fits within containers
Account for safe areas and other fixed elements
Understand what creates new stacking context
Use dvh or account for mobile browser chrome
Avoid horizontal swipe on main content
Use for confirmations and important actions
Use visible focus rings on interactive elements
Change cursor and add subtle visual change
Disable button and show loading state
Show clear error messages near problem
Show success message or visual change
Use icons/text in addition to color
Descriptive alt text for meaningful images
Use semantic HTML and ARIA properly
Use label with for attribute or wrap input
Use aria-live or role=alert for errors
Provide skip to main content link
Lazy load below-fold images and content
Always show label above or beside input
Validate on blur for most fields
Use email tel number url etc
Start with mobile styles then add breakpoints
Use horizontal scroll or card layout
Use darker text on light backgrounds
Truncate with ellipsis and expand option
Stream text response token by token

dashboardLayouts.name: The Enterprise Classic (Sidebar + Main)
dashboardLayouts.description: Standard for high-productivity SaaS. Persistent navigation on the left, top-bar for breadcrumbs/search/profile, and a multi-column content area.
structure: Sidebar: Brand -> Nav Groups -> Footer Menu (Collapse toggle)
TopBar: Breadcrumbs / Search -> Activity/Notifications -> User Profile
Main: Header (Title + Actions) -> Metric Row -> Tabbed Content / Data Grid

dashboardLayouts.name: The Command Center (Metric Heavy)
dashboardLayouts.description: Used for monitoring and operations. Focus on high-density information display and real-time updates.
structure: Row 2: Large Trend Chart (70%) + Quick Actions Feed (30%)

dashboardLayouts.name: The Spatial Feed
dashboardLayouts.description: Modern, mobile-inspired dashboard. Centered feed of 'Cards' or 'Tasks', with floating auxiliary panels.
structure: Background: Dynamic gradient or glass floor
Center: Feed of actionable cards (staggered entrance)
Floating: Navigation bar on bottom or side (glassmorphism)

adminModules.name: User & Role Management
adminModules.description: High-fidelity interface for managing platform participants and their access levels.
structure: Filters: Role, Status, Tenant/Org, Activity Date
Slide-over: User Detail with Activity Log

adminModules.name: The Audit Sentinel (Logs)
adminModules.description: Transparency and security tracking. Focus on readability of large temporal datasets.
structure: JSON Inspector: Expandable rows for deep metadata audit

adminModules.name: Configuration Vault
adminModules.description: Centralized engine for feature flags, environment variables, and system settings.
structure: Siloed Categories: Core, AI, Integrations, Storage

saasPatterns.name: Multi-tenant Switcher
saasPatterns.description: Seamless transition between organizations or environments.
structure: Team/Tenant Cards: Logo + Name + Usage Metric

saasPatterns.name: Billing & Subscription Lifecycle
saasPatterns.description: Managing the financial relationship with customers.
structure: Usage Meters: API calls, Storage, Seats (Color coded by proximity to limit)
Payment Bridge: Card management + Invoice history

charts.Keywords: trend, time-series, line, growth, timeline, progress
charts.ColorGuidance: Primary: #0080FF. Multiple series: use distinct colors. Fill: 20% opacity
charts.AccessibilityNotes: ✓ Clear line patterns for colorblind users. Add pattern overlays.

charts.ColorGuidance: Each bar: distinct color. Category: grouped same color. Sorted: descending order
charts.AccessibilityNotes: ✓ Easy to compare. Add value labels on bars for clarity.

charts.Keywords: part-to-whole, pie, donut, percentage, proportion, share
charts.ColorGuidance: Colors: 5-6 max. Contrasting palette. Large slices first. Use labels.
charts.AccessibilityNotes: ⚠ Hard for accessibility. Better: Stacked bar with legend. Avoid pie if >5 items.

charts.ColorGuidance: Color axis: gradient (blue-red). Size: relative. Opacity: 0.6-0.8 to show density
charts.AccessibilityNotes: ⚠ Provide data table alternative. Use pattern + color distinction.

charts.ColorGuidance: Gradient: Cool (blue) to Hot (red). Scale: clear legend. Divergent for ±data
charts.AccessibilityNotes: ⚠ Colorblind: Use pattern overlay. Provide numerical legend.

charts.Keywords: geographic, map, location, region, geo, spatial
charts.ColorGuidance: Regional: single color gradient or categorized colors. Legend: clear scale
charts.AccessibilityNotes: ⚠ Include text labels for regions. Provide data table alternative.

charts.ColorGuidance: Stages: gradient (starting color → ending color). Show conversion %
charts.AccessibilityNotes: ✓ Clear stage labels + percentages. Good for accessibility if labeled.

charts.ColorGuidance: Performance: Red→Yellow→Green gradient. Target: marker line. Threshold colors
charts.AccessibilityNotes: ✓ Add numerical value + percentage label beside gauge.

charts.ColorGuidance: Actual: solid line #0080FF. Forecast: dashed #FF9500. Band: light shading
charts.AccessibilityNotes: ✓ Clearly distinguish actual vs forecast. Add legend.

charts.ColorGuidance: Normal: blue #0080FF. Anomaly: red #FF0000 circle/square marker + alert
charts.AccessibilityNotes: ✓ Circle/marker for anomalies. Add text alert annotation.

charts.ColorGuidance: Parent: distinct hues. Children: lighter shades. White borders 2-3px.
charts.AccessibilityNotes: ⚠ Poor - provide table alternative. Label large areas.

charts.ColorGuidance: Gradient from source to target. Opacity 0.4-0.6 for flows.
charts.AccessibilityNotes: ⚠ Poor - provide flow table alternative.

charts.ColorGuidance: Increases: #4CAF50. Decreases: #F44336. Start: #2196F3. End: #0D47A1.
charts.AccessibilityNotes: ✓ Good - clear directional colors with labels.

charts.ColorGuidance: Single: #0080FF 20% fill. Multiple: distinct colors per dataset.
charts.AccessibilityNotes: ⚠ Moderate - limit 5-8 axes. Add data table.

charts.ColorGuidance: Bullish: #26A69A. Bearish: #EF5350. Volume: 40% opacity below.
charts.AccessibilityNotes: ⚠ Moderate - provide OHLC data table.

charts.ColorGuidance: Node types: categorical colors. Edges: #90A4AE 60% opacity.
charts.AccessibilityNotes: ❌ Very Poor - provide adjacency list alternative.

charts.ColorGuidance: Box: #BBDEFB. Border: #1976D2. Median: #D32F2F. Outliers: #F44336.
charts.AccessibilityNotes: ✓ Good - include stats table (min, Q1, median, Q3, max).

charts.ColorGuidance: Ranges: #FFCDD2, #FFF9C4, #C8E6C9. Performance: #1976D2. Target: black 3px.
charts.AccessibilityNotes: ✓ Excellent - compact with clear values.

charts.ColorGuidance: 10x10 grid. 3-5 categories max. 2-3px spacing between squares.
charts.AccessibilityNotes: ✓ Good - better than pie for accessibility.

charts.ColorGuidance: Center to outer: darker to lighter. 15-20% lighter per level.
charts.AccessibilityNotes: ⚠ Poor - provide hierarchy table alternative.

charts.Keywords: root cause, decomposition, tree, hierarchy, drill-down, ai-split
charts.ColorGuidance: Nodes: #2563EB (Primary) vs #EF4444 (Negative impact). Connectors: Neutral grey.
charts.AccessibilityNotes: ✓ clear hierarchy. Allow keyboard navigation for nodes.

charts.ColorGuidance: Depth cues: lighting/shading. Z-axis: color gradient (cool to warm).
charts.AccessibilityNotes: ❌ Poor - requires alternative 2D view or data table.

charts.Keywords: streaming, real-time, ticker, live, velocity, pulse
charts.ColorGuidance: Current: Bright Pulse (#00FF00). History: Fading opacity. Grid: Dark.
charts.AccessibilityNotes: ⚠ Flashing elements - provide pause button. High contrast.

charts.ColorGuidance: Positive: #22C55E. Negative: #EF4444. Neutral: #94A3B8. Size = Frequency.
charts.AccessibilityNotes: ⚠ Word clouds poor for screen readers. Use list view.

charts.Keywords: process, mining, variants, path, bottleneck, log
charts.ColorGuidance: Happy path: #10B981 (Thick). Deviations: #F59E0B (Thin). Bottlenecks: #EF4444.
charts.AccessibilityNotes: ⚠ Complex graphs hard to navigate. Provide path summary.

landingPatterns.Keywords: hero, hero-centric, features, feature-rich, cta, call-to-action
landingPatterns.SectionOrder: 1. Hero with headline/image, 2. Value prop, 3. Key features (3-5), 4. CTA section, 5. Footer
landingPatterns.PrimaryCTAPlacement: Hero (sticky) + Bottom
landingPatterns.ColorStrategy: Hero: Brand primary or vibrant. Features: Card bg #FAFAFA. CTA: Contrasting accent color
landingPatterns.RecommendedEffects: Hero parallax, feature card hover lift, CTA glow on hover
landingPatterns.ConversionOptimization: Deep CTA placement. Use contrasting color (at least 7:1 contrast ratio). Sticky navbar CTA.

landingPatterns.Keywords: hero, testimonials, social-proof, trust, reviews, cta
landingPatterns.SectionOrder: 1. Hero, 2. Problem statement, 3. Solution overview, 4. Testimonials carousel, 5. CTA
landingPatterns.PrimaryCTAPlacement: Hero (sticky) + Post-testimonials
landingPatterns.ColorStrategy: Hero: Brand color. Testimonials: Light bg #F5F5F5. Quotes: Italic, muted color #666. CTA: Vibrant
landingPatterns.RecommendedEffects: Testimonial carousel slide animations, quote marks animations, avatar fade-in
landingPatterns.ConversionOptimization: Social proof before CTA. Use 3-5 testimonials. Include photo + name + role. CTA after social proof.

landingPatterns.SectionOrder: 1. Hero, 2. Product video/mockup (center), 3. Feature breakdown per section, 4. Comparison (optional), 5. CTA
landingPatterns.PrimaryCTAPlacement: Video center + CTA right/bottom
landingPatterns.ColorStrategy: Video surround: Brand color overlay. Features: Icon color #0080FF. Text: Dark #222
landingPatterns.RecommendedEffects: Video play button pulse, feature scroll reveals, demo interaction highlights
landingPatterns.ConversionOptimization: Embedded product demo increases engagement. Use interactive mockup if possible. Auto-play video muted.

landingPatterns.SectionOrder: 1. Hero headline, 2. Short description, 3. Benefit bullets (3 max), 4. CTA, 5. Footer
landingPatterns.PrimaryCTAPlacement: Center, large CTA button
landingPatterns.ColorStrategy: Minimalist: Brand + white #FFFFFF + accent. Buttons: High contrast 7:1+. Text: Black/Dark grey
landingPatterns.RecommendedEffects: Minimal hover effects. Smooth scroll. CTA scale on hover (subtle)
landingPatterns.ConversionOptimization: Single CTA focus. Large typography. Lots of whitespace. No nav clutter. Mobile-first.

landingPatterns.SectionOrder: 1. Hero, 2. Step 1 (problem), 3. Step 2 (solution), 4. Step 3 (action), 5. CTA progression
landingPatterns.PrimaryCTAPlacement: Each step: mini-CTA. Final: main CTA
landingPatterns.ColorStrategy: Step colors: 1 (Red/Problem), 2 (Orange/Process), 3 (Green/Solution). CTA: Brand color
landingPatterns.RecommendedEffects: Step number animations, progress bar fill, step transitions smooth scroll
landingPatterns.ConversionOptimization: Progressive disclosure. Show only essential info per step. Use progress indicators. Multiple CTAs.

landingPatterns.SectionOrder: 1. Hero, 2. Problem intro, 3. Comparison table (product vs competitors), 4. Pricing (optional), 5. CTA
landingPatterns.PrimaryCTAPlacement: Table: Right column. CTA: Below table
landingPatterns.ColorStrategy: Table: Alternating rows (white/light grey). Your product: Highlight #FFFACD (light yellow) or green. Text: Dark
landingPatterns.RecommendedEffects: Table row hover highlight, price toggle animations, feature checkmark animations
landingPatterns.ConversionOptimization: Use comparison to show unique value. Highlight your product row. Include 'free trial' in pricing row.

landingPatterns.Keywords: lead, form, signup, capture, email, magnet
landingPatterns.SectionOrder: 1. Hero (benefit headline), 2. Lead magnet preview (ebook cover, checklist, etc), 3. Form (minimal fields), 4. CTA submit
landingPatterns.PrimaryCTAPlacement: Form CTA: Submit button
landingPatterns.ColorStrategy: Lead magnet: Professional design. Form: Clean white bg. Inputs: Light border #CCCCCC. CTA: Brand color
landingPatterns.RecommendedEffects: Form focus state animations, input validation animations, success confirmation animation
landingPatterns.ConversionOptimization: Form fields ≤ 3 for best conversion. Offer valuable lead magnet preview. Show form submission progress.

landingPatterns.SectionOrder: 1. Hero (pricing headline), 2. Price comparison cards, 3. Feature comparison table, 4. FAQ section, 5. Final CTA
landingPatterns.PrimaryCTAPlacement: Each card: CTA button. Sticky CTA in nav
landingPatterns.ColorStrategy: Free: Grey, Starter: Blue, Pro: Green/Gold, Enterprise: Dark. Cards: 1px border, shadow
landingPatterns.RecommendedEffects: Price toggle animation (monthly/yearly), card comparison highlight, FAQ accordion open/close
landingPatterns.ConversionOptimization: Recommend starter plan (pre-select/highlight). Show annual discount (20-30%). Use FAQs to address concerns.

landingPatterns.SectionOrder: 1. Hero with video background, 2. Key features overlay, 3. Benefits section, 4. CTA
landingPatterns.PrimaryCTAPlacement: Overlay on video (center/bottom) + Bottom section
landingPatterns.ColorStrategy: Dark overlay 60% on video. Brand accent for CTA. White text on dark.
landingPatterns.RecommendedEffects: Video autoplay muted, parallax scroll, text fade-in on scroll
landingPatterns.ConversionOptimization: 86% higher engagement with video. Add captions for accessibility. Compress video for performance.

landingPatterns.SectionOrder: 1. Intro hook, 2. Chapter 1 (problem), 3. Chapter 2 (journey), 4. Chapter 3 (solution), 5. Climax CTA
landingPatterns.PrimaryCTAPlacement: End of each chapter (mini) + Final climax CTA
landingPatterns.ColorStrategy: Progressive reveal. Each chapter has distinct color. Building intensity.
landingPatterns.RecommendedEffects: ScrollTrigger animations, parallax layers, progressive disclosure, chapter transitions
landingPatterns.ConversionOptimization: Narrative increases time-on-page 3x. Use progress indicator. Mobile: simplify animations.

landingPatterns.SectionOrder: 1. Dynamic hero (personalized), 2. Relevant features, 3. Tailored testimonials, 4. Smart CTA
landingPatterns.PrimaryCTAPlacement: Context-aware placement based on user segment
landingPatterns.ColorStrategy: Adaptive based on user data. A/B test color variations per segment.
landingPatterns.RecommendedEffects: Dynamic content swap, fade transitions, personalized product recommendations
landingPatterns.ConversionOptimization: 20%+ conversion with personalization. Requires analytics integration. Fallback for new users.

landingPatterns.SectionOrder: 1. Hero with countdown, 2. Product teaser/preview, 3. Email capture form, 4. Social proof (waitlist count)
landingPatterns.PrimaryCTAPlacement: Email form prominent (above fold) + Sticky form on scroll
landingPatterns.ColorStrategy: Anticipation: Dark + accent highlights. Countdown in brand color. Urgency indicators.
landingPatterns.RecommendedEffects: Countdown timer animation, email validation feedback, success confetti, social share buttons
landingPatterns.ConversionOptimization: Scarcity + exclusivity. Show waitlist count. Early access benefits. Referral program.

landingPatterns.SectionOrder: 1. Hero (problem statement), 2. Comparison matrix (you vs competitors), 3. Feature deep-dive, 4. Winner CTA
landingPatterns.PrimaryCTAPlacement: After comparison table (highlighted row) + Bottom
landingPatterns.ColorStrategy: Your product column highlighted (accent bg or green). Competitors neutral. Checkmarks green.
landingPatterns.RecommendedEffects: Table row hover highlight, feature checkmark animations, sticky comparison header
landingPatterns.ConversionOptimization: Show value vs competitors. 35% higher conversion. Be factual. Include pricing if favorable.

landingPatterns.SectionOrder: 1. Hero (value proposition), 2. Pricing cards (3 tiers), 3. Feature comparison, 4. FAQ, 5. Final CTA
landingPatterns.PrimaryCTAPlacement: Each pricing card + Sticky CTA in nav + Bottom
landingPatterns.ColorStrategy: Popular plan highlighted (brand color border/bg). Free: grey. Enterprise: dark/premium.
landingPatterns.RecommendedEffects: Price toggle monthly/annual animation, card hover lift, FAQ accordion smooth open
landingPatterns.ConversionOptimization: Annual discount 20-30%. Recommend mid-tier (most popular badge). Address objections in FAQ.

landingPatterns.SectionOrder: 1. Hero with device mockup, 2. Screenshots carousel, 3. Features with icons, 4. Reviews/ratings, 5. Download CTAs
landingPatterns.PrimaryCTAPlacement: Download buttons prominent (App Store + Play Store) throughout
landingPatterns.ColorStrategy: Dark/light matching app store feel. Star ratings in gold. Screenshots with device frames.
landingPatterns.RecommendedEffects: Device mockup rotations, screenshot slider, star rating animations, download button pulse
landingPatterns.ConversionOptimization: Show real screenshots. Include ratings (4.5+ stars). QR code for mobile. Platform-specific CTAs.

landingPatterns.SectionOrder: 1. Hero with search bar, 2. Popular categories, 3. FAQ accordion, 4. Contact/support CTA
landingPatterns.PrimaryCTAPlacement: Search bar prominent + Contact CTA for unresolved questions
landingPatterns.ColorStrategy: Clean, high readability. Minimal color. Category icons in brand color. Success green for resolved.
landingPatterns.RecommendedEffects: Search autocomplete, smooth accordion open/close, category hover, helpful feedback buttons
landingPatterns.ConversionOptimization: Reduce support tickets. Track search analytics. Show related articles. Contact escalation path.

landingPatterns.SectionOrder: 1. Full-screen interactive element, 2. Guided product tour, 3. Key benefits revealed, 4. CTA after completion
landingPatterns.PrimaryCTAPlacement: After interaction complete + Skip option for impatient users
landingPatterns.ColorStrategy: Immersive experience colors. Dark background for focus. Highlight interactive elements.
landingPatterns.RecommendedEffects: WebGL, 3D interactions, gamification elements, progress indicators, reward animations
landingPatterns.ConversionOptimization: 40% higher engagement. Performance trade-off. Provide skip option. Mobile fallback essential.

landingPatterns.SectionOrder: 1. Hero (date/location/countdown), 2. Speakers grid, 3. Agenda/schedule, 4. Sponsors, 5. Register CTA
landingPatterns.PrimaryCTAPlacement: Register CTA sticky + After speakers + Bottom
landingPatterns.ColorStrategy: Urgency colors (countdown). Event branding. Speaker cards professional. Sponsor logos neutral.
landingPatterns.RecommendedEffects: Countdown timer, speaker hover cards with bio, agenda tabs, early bird countdown
landingPatterns.ConversionOptimization: Early bird pricing with deadline. Social proof (past attendees). Speaker credibility. Multi-ticket discounts.

landingPatterns.SectionOrder: 1. Hero (product + aggregate rating), 2. Rating breakdown, 3. Individual reviews, 4. Buy/CTA
landingPatterns.PrimaryCTAPlacement: After reviews summary + Buy button alongside reviews
landingPatterns.ColorStrategy: Trust colors. Star ratings gold. Verified badge green. Review sentiment colors.
landingPatterns.RecommendedEffects: Star fill animations, review filtering, helpful vote interactions, photo lightbox
landingPatterns.ConversionOptimization: User-generated content builds trust. Show verified purchases. Filter by rating. Respond to negative reviews.

landingPatterns.SectionOrder: 1. Hero (community value prop), 2. Popular topics/categories, 3. Active members showcase, 4. Join CTA
landingPatterns.PrimaryCTAPlacement: Join button prominent + After member showcase
landingPatterns.ColorStrategy: Warm, welcoming. Member photos add humanity. Topic badges in brand colors. Activity indicators green.
landingPatterns.RecommendedEffects: Member avatars animation, activity feed live updates, topic hover previews, join success celebration
landingPatterns.ConversionOptimization: Show active community (member count, posts today). Highlight benefits. Preview content. Easy onboarding.

landingPatterns.SectionOrder: 1. Hero (problem state), 2. Transformation slider/comparison, 3. How it works, 4. Results CTA
landingPatterns.PrimaryCTAPlacement: After transformation reveal + Bottom
landingPatterns.ColorStrategy: Contrast: muted/grey (before) vs vibrant/colorful (after). Success green for results.
landingPatterns.RecommendedEffects: Slider comparison interaction, before/after reveal animations, result counters, testimonial videos
landingPatterns.ConversionOptimization: Visual proof of value. 45% higher conversion. Real results. Specific metrics. Guarantee offer.

landingPatterns.SectionOrder: 1. Hero (Search focused), 2. Categories, 3. Featured Listings, 4. Trust/Safety, 5. CTA (Become a host/seller)
landingPatterns.PrimaryCTAPlacement: Hero Search Bar + Navbar 'List your item'
landingPatterns.ColorStrategy: Search: High contrast. Categories: Visual icons. Trust: Blue/Green.
landingPatterns.RecommendedEffects: Search autocomplete animation
landingPatterns.ConversionOptimization: map hover pins,  card carousel, Search bar is the CTA. Reduce friction to search. Popular searches suggestions.

landingPatterns.SectionOrder: 1. Hero (Value Prop + Form), 2. Recent Issues/Archives, 3. Social Proof (Subscriber count), 4. About Author
landingPatterns.PrimaryCTAPlacement: Hero inline form + Sticky header form
landingPatterns.ColorStrategy: Minimalist. Paper-like background. Text focus. Accent color for Subscribe.
landingPatterns.RecommendedEffects: Text highlight animations
landingPatterns.ConversionOptimization: typewriter effect,  subtle fade-in, Single field form (Email only). Show 'Join X, 000 readers'. Read sample link.

landingPatterns.SectionOrder: 1. Hero (Topic + Timer + Form), 2. What you'll learn, 3. Speaker Bio, 4. Urgency/Bonuses, 5. Form (again)
landingPatterns.PrimaryCTAPlacement: Hero (Right side form) + Bottom anchor
landingPatterns.ColorStrategy: Urgency: Red/Orange. Professional: Blue/Navy. Form: High contrast white.
landingPatterns.RecommendedEffects: Countdown timer
landingPatterns.ConversionOptimization: speaker avatar float,  urgent ticker, Limited seats logic. 'Live' indicator. Auto-fill timezone.

landingPatterns.SectionOrder: 1. Hero (Video/Mission), 2. Solutions by Industry, 3. Solutions by Role, 4. Client Logos, 5. Contact Sales
landingPatterns.PrimaryCTAPlacement: Contact Sales (Primary) + Login (Secondary)
landingPatterns.ColorStrategy: Corporate: Navy/Grey. High integrity. Conservative accents.
landingPatterns.RecommendedEffects: Slow video background
landingPatterns.ConversionOptimization: logo carousel,  tab switching for industries, Path selection (I am a...). Mega menu navigation. Trust signals prominent.

landingPatterns.SectionOrder: 1. Hero (Name/Role), 2. Project Grid (Masonry), 3. About/Philosophy, 4. Contact
landingPatterns.PrimaryCTAPlacement: Project Card Hover + Footer Contact
landingPatterns.ColorStrategy: Neutral background (let work shine). Text: Black/White. Accent: Minimal.
landingPatterns.RecommendedEffects: Image lazy load reveal
landingPatterns.ConversionOptimization: hover overlay info,  lightbox view, Visuals first. Filter by category. Fast loading essential.

landingPatterns.Keywords: horizontal, scroll, journey, gallery, storytelling, panoramic
landingPatterns.SectionOrder: 1. Intro (Vertical), 2. The Journey (Horizontal Track), 3. Detail Reveal, 4. Vertical Footer
landingPatterns.PrimaryCTAPlacement: Floating Sticky CTA or End of Horizontal Track
landingPatterns.ColorStrategy: Continuous palette transition. Chapter colors. Progress bar #000000.
landingPatterns.RecommendedEffects: Scroll-jacking (careful), parallax layers, horizontal slide, progress indicator
landingPatterns.ConversionOptimization: Immersive product discovery. High engagement. Keep navigation visible.

landingPatterns.SectionOrder: grid
landingPatterns.PrimaryCTAPlacement: features
landingPatterns.ColorStrategy: modular
landingPatterns.RecommendedEffects: apple-style
landingPatterns.ConversionOptimization: showcase

landingPatterns.SectionOrder: configurator
landingPatterns.PrimaryCTAPlacement: customizer
landingPatterns.ColorStrategy: interactive
landingPatterns.RecommendedEffects: product
landingPatterns.ConversionOptimization: 1. Hero (Configurator)

landingPatterns.SectionOrder: dynamic
landingPatterns.PrimaryCTAPlacement: personalized
landingPatterns.ColorStrategy: adaptive
landingPatterns.RecommendedEffects: generative
landingPatterns.ConversionOptimization: 1. Prompt/Input Hero
